Item.name: Nitroglycerin Syringe
Item.description: A syringe containing a dose of nitroglycerin and stabilozine which is typically used to treat organ damage. DO NOT OVERDOSE.

Item.name: Abyssal Blood
Item.description: A syringe containing a dark substance which seems to be perpetually decaying. Do not consume.

Item.name: Abyss Vaccine Type I
Item.description: A poorly understood stabilization of the abyssal decay. Prevents the affliction from worsening, but doesn't cure it. Do not inject if you are healthy.

Item.name: Abyss Vaccine Type II
Item.description: A poorly understood antagonist of the abyssal decay. When injected alongside Type 1, reverts the decay to some extent. Do not inject without first using the Type 1.

Item.name: Abyss Vaccine Type III
Item.description: A poorly understood antithesis of the abyssal decay. When injected alongside Type 1 and 2, cures the decay. Do not inject without first using the Type 1 and 2.

Item.name: Healing Pod
Item.description: A cut-down bunk with some built-in medical equipment to accelerate the natural healing of wounds.

Item.name: Hyperius Asperivirus Syringe
Item.description: A syringe containing an extremely contagious specimen of an airborne and waterborne virus that has been identified since humanity arrived, primarily affecting the respiratory and gastrointestinal system.

Item.name: Hyperius Asperivirus Antidote
Item.description: A syringe predominantly containing Stabilozine and ABX, capable of dissolving the protein coating of the asperivirus virions and allowing fast recovery in addition to temporary immunity.

Item.name: Genetic Flayer Syringe
Item.description: A mix of multiple toxic chemicals and radioactive substances designed to break down the patient's genetic structure, causing mutations and massive damage.

Item.name: Genetic Stabilization Syringe
Item.description: A mix of multiple medicines designed to restabilize a patient's genetic code.

Item.name: Advanced Genetic Stabilization Syringe
Item.description: A complex mix of multiple medicines designed to remove negative genetic code without harming the positive code.

Item.name: Husk Stabilization Syringe
Item.description: An injection that prevents a husk from decaying into an old husk.

Item.name: Blessed Blood Pack
Item.description: A pack of blood substitute which has been infused with some kind of energy, enhancing its healing properties significantly.

Item.name: Elixir of Resurrection
Item.description: A deusizine syringe filled with an unknown substance charged with unholy magical essence. Be careful what you do with this.

Item.name: Elixir of Resurrection Placeholder
Item.description: Deconstruct this to get an Elixir of Resurrection.

Item.name: Cursed Fentanyl
Item.description: An already potent substance empowered further by the use of dark magic. Unfortunately, the power is far too much for the human body to handle. Using this is often a death sentence.

Item.name: Europinium
Item.description: A cocktail of potent healing drugs that is designed to gradually heal the user for a long period of time.

Item.name: Warmth Injector
Item.description: A mix of multiple medicines designed to warm up the patient and restore frozen cells.

Item.name: Tobacconade
Item.description: Chemically mixing tobacco and pomegrenade extract results in a low-grade antipsychotic. It has the unfortunate side effect of causing a mild high.

Item.name: Cyanide Pill
Item.description: A highly potent cyanide syringe used to instantly kill oneself. Cannot be used on others. Aim and 'fire' to use.
